content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Customer Support

Have a question? Need some help? Get in touch with us.

Call us or Text us.

 (540) 785 3581
 techfix@thetechfixers.com
 Hours Of Operation:

Monday -Thursday: 10:00AM – 7:30PM

Friday – Saturday: 10:00 AM – 8:00

Sunday 11:00AM – 6:00PM

Address: 1990 William St, Fredericksburg, VA 22401

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″]

[/vc_column][vc_column][vc_empty_space alter_height=”small” hide_on_desktop=”” hide_on_notebook=”” hide_on_tablet=”” hide_on_mobile=””][/vc_column][/vc_row]
